thread.title: Ilayathalapathy Vijay Helps Raghava Lawrence With 5 Lakh Rupees To Educate Poor Kids
thread.title_full: Ilayathalapathy Vijay Helps Raghava Lawrence With 5 Lakh Rupees To Educate Poor Kids

title: Ilayathalapathy Vijay Helps Raghava Lawrence With 5 Lakh Rupees To Educate Poor Kids
text:
Posted by: Avinash Gopinath Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 13:20 [IST] 
Raghava Lawrence , in one of the recent events attended by him, has revealed that Ilayathalapathy Vijay donated 5 Lakh rupees which will be used to provide education to poor kids at respected schools and institutions. 
The choreographer turned actor turned filmmaker is also the founder of a charitable trust which provides food, shelter, education to many and much more. 
Lawrence too had recently donated 1 Crore rupees to the organization, 'Kalamin Kalachuvadu', which aims at providing education to all in an attempt to fulfill the dream of India's ex-President Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam. 
The Kanchana actor has also revealed that apart from Vijay, celebrities like Simbu , Vijay Sethupathi , Taapsee, Jai and Tamannaah have helped his trust in educating many kids by donating money. 
It is heartening indeed to know that many celebrities have come forward to help Raghava Lawrence which will only fuel his noble intentions to greater heights. 
As far as his movies are concerned, the talented actor will be featuring in movies titled Oru Ticketla Rendu Cinema and Motta Siva Ketta Siva . He will also be directing and acting in the fourth installment of his Muni series titled as Muni 4: Naaga.
